title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 605.5 - Transportation of atomic weapons
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 605.5 - Transportation of atomic weapons

State Regulations

No vehicle shall enter the vehicular crossing if its load
includes any weapon of war employing atomic fission or radioactive force, or
any component part of such weapon containing a fissionable material, or any
forbidden explosives as defined by I.C.C. regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
605.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
